input_text:
Job Title: Lead CT Tech position - Outpatient Imaging Center

Location: Cottonwood, AZ

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
Job Description

Are you a skilled CT Tech looking to take the next step in your career? Connected Health Care, in partnership with a prominent medical facility in Cottonwood, AZ, is seeking a dedicated and experienced Lead CT Tech to join their outpatient imaging center. This full-time Lead CT Technical role comes with a compelling salary and benefits package.

As a Lead CT Tech, you will play a crucial role in overseeing and managing the day-to-day operations of the CT department. This is an exciting opportunity to work with state-of-the-art facilities and equipment in a supportive and collaborative work environment.

Role

If you were already in this Lead CT Tech role, here are some areas you might have been working in this week:

Performing CT scansEnsuring equipment maintenanceCollaborating with medical professionals to provide high-quality patient careMaintaining the highest standards of patient safety and confidentiality

Requirements

The successful Lead CT Tech applicant will have Current ARRT (American Registry of Radiologic Technologists) certification and AZ State licensure in XR & CT. Additional requirements include:

At least 3 years of experience as a CT TechDemonstrated leadership skills and the ability to work collaboratively in a teamExcellent organizational and communication skills

You'll receive an excellent salary and benefits package for your knowledge, expertise, and flexibility.

Please don't hesitate to get in touch with our Connected Health Care team today to apply and register your interest for this full-time Lead CT Tech position - Outpatient Imaging Center job in Cottonwood. We're looking forward to meeting you.

Connected Health Care is a healthcare staffing agency specializing in travel nursing, travel allied health, and permanent placement. Our team of professional healthcare recruiters is focused on providing medical professionals with the most fulfilling career path, whether they’re traveling with us for a season or looking for a permanent place to call home. Navigating the world of recruiting is a complex task. Changes in people’s interests, the economy, and technology make every day different. What doesn’t change is our commitment to connecting inspired people with visionary companies.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
